name: Youre Being Chased By Nothing
description:
Nothing ... is something

Nothing is something, you can count on that. Nothing is dangerous, you better get out of here soon...

This is my 1st attempt at a horror game,I tried my best! This Ludum Dare was a lot different, I took risks, scoped big, and try some new stuff. I had a lot of fun and cant wait till the next jam. Thanks for playing!!
